text:
Hi Maike, I'm sorry I haven't been in touch at all, I have spent all my time trying to make the post-viz version of my film the best it can be so that I meet the deadline with confidence, The deadline was on the 13th of May so now I am just going back and refining the animation as I didn't get to finesse the majority of it for a show where we present our films to the audience and the critics, I was wondering if you could have a look and tell me what you think?

link <https://vimeo.com/335865765>

I was also wondering if you could give me some insight about getting my foot into the door with an animation studio? I am pretty much finished uni now and I really need to get a job and honestly it is something that is kind of worrying as I just really want to get in somewhere, Have you any tips about getting into the I industry? what are studios looking for in a person? I would love to know how you got into your position at the third floor inc :slightly_smiling_face:
